biotools.summary: Program implementing the method described in Nielsen et al. 2005. Genomic scans for selective sweeps using SNP data. Genome Research 1566-1575. It can be used to detect the location of a selective sweep based on SNP data. It will also estimate the frequency spectrum of observed SNP data in the presence of missing data.

bioschemas.name: SweepFinder
